title: Cannot log in to the Web UI
answer:
(1) Please check the IP address of PC and the maintain IP address of CPE are in the same network segment
(2) Please check the Internet Explorer parameters, ensure the proxy server is disable. Take the Internet Explorer 6.0 as an example.perform the following steps:
a. Open the Internet Explorer 6.0.
b. Choose Tools > Internet Options... , select the Connections tab.
c. Click LAN Settings....Deselect Use a proxy server for your LAN. If select, click the check box to deselect it.
d. Click OK to save changes
(3) restore it to defalut and login again
